overview: Revel in the sheer enjoyment of creativity with eccentric artist, engineer and composer Trimpin as he collaborates with the Kronos Quartet, performs various types of sonic experiments, constructs unique structures and sculptures and more. In addition to examining Trimpin's creative process, this revealing documentary also explores the genius's stockpile of self-made instruments, inventions and gizmos.
title: Trimpin: The Sound of Invention
